column2: "Na mbra no wɔ ndzepa a ɔbɛba no no mfonyi na nnyɛ ndzɛmba no suban ankasa ntsi
column3: wonntum mmfa afɔr kor no ara a wɔbɔ no afrenhyia afrenhyia no mma hɔn a wɔba no nndzi mu da."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔba asɔr no na wɔatsew hɔnho prɛko no
column3: sɛ wonnyi bɔn ho tsibowa bio a nkyɛ woenngyaa afɔr bɔ anaa?"

column2: "Na mbom wɔbɔ bɔn ho nkaa wɔ mu afrenhyia biara
column4: "osiandɛ anantwinyin nye mpɔnkye bɔgyaa runntum nnyi bɔn nnkɔ."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi ɔbaa wiadze no
column3: ɔkaa dɛ
column4: Afɔr nye ayɛyɛdze
column6: Na nyimpadua na esiesie ama me;"

column2: "Hyew afɔr mu nye bɔn ho dze annsɔ w’enyi:"
"Nna mesee dɛ
column3: Hwɛ
column4: maba
column7: Nyankopɔn dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no mo ho wɔ nwoma mbobɔwee no mu."

column2: "Ɔkaa no hɔ dɛ
column3: Afɔr nye ayɛyɛdze nye hyew afɔr nye bɔn afɔr dze ammpɛ
column4: eso w’enyi annsɔ (ɔnye dza wɔnam mbra do dze ma no) no
column7: Maba merebɛyɛ wo pɛ. Oyi dza odzi kan no hɔ
column8: na ɔdze dza otsia ebien no eesi hɔ."

column2: "Dɛm pɛ no do na wɔnam Jesus Kraest honam a ɔdze bɔɔ afɔr prɛko maa hɛn no do atsew hɛn ho."
"Na ɔsɔfo biara dze ogyina som daa daa bɔ afɔr kor no ara a onntum nnyi bɔn nnkɔ da no:"
"na ɔno dze
column3: onyae bɔɔ bɔn ho afɔr kor no
column4: ɔkɛtsenaa Nyankopɔn nyimfa daa;"

column2: "hɔ na n’enyi ada kwan dɛ wɔdze n’atamfo bɛyɛ n’ananadzegua."
"Na ɔnam afɔr kor do ama hɔn a wɔatsew hɔn ho no edzi mu daa."
"Na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn so dzi hɛn dase: na odzi kan ka dɛ
column4: "Iyi nye ahyɛmu a menye hɔn bedzi Nda no ekyir no
column5: Ewuradze na ɔse: Medze me mbra bɛhyɛ hɔn akoma mu
column6: Na makyerɛw no hɔn adwen mu so;"

column2: "nna ɔka so dɛ
column3: Na hɔn bɔn nye hɔn mbrato merennkaa bio."

column2: "Na mbrɛ yinom ho fakyɛ wɔ no
column3: bɔn ho afɔr bi nnyi hɔ bio."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi
column3: enuanom
column4: yɛnam Jesus bɔgyaa do enya ndam dɛ yɛdze bɛhɛn krɔnkrɔnbea no
column6: "ɔnam ɔkwan a woesiesie ato hɛn hɔ no mu
column7: kwan fofor a ɔwɔ nkwa a ɔnam ntwamutam a ɔyɛ no honam no do."

column2: "Na dɛ yɛwɔ sɔfo kɛse a odzi Nyankopɔn fie do ntsi
column4: "hom mma yɛmfa nokwar akoma ntwe mpin wɔ gyedzi amayɛ mu
column5: dɛ wɔapetse hɛn akoma ho efi tsibowa bɔn mu
column6: na woeguar hɛn nyimpadua wɔ nsu krɔnkrɔn mu."

column2: "Hom mma yensuo hɛn enyidado a yɛpaa mu ka no mu yie
column3: amma oeennhihim
column4: na nyia ɔbɔɔ anohoba no ɔyɛ nokwafo."

column2: "Hom mma yɛndwendwen hɛnho do
column3: nnunu hɛnho nkɔ dɔ nye ndwuma pa mu;"

column2: "na mma yenngyaa hɛnho hɛnho ehyiadzi
column3: dɛ mbrɛ binom hɔn ntɔyɛɛ tse
column4: na yentutu hɛnho fo pii wɔ ber a hom nyim dɛ da no rebɛn yi."

column2: "Na yeenya nokwar no ho nyimdzee ekyir yi
column3: sɛ yɛboapa kɛyɛ bɔn a
column4: bɔn ho afɔrbɔ nnyi hɔ bio
column6: "na mbom atsɛmbu ho akwanhwɛ a ɔyɛ hu bi
column7: nye ogyaframee bi a ɔbɛhyew atamfo no."

column2: "Na sɛ nyimpa a ɔpow Moses mbra no
column3: wokwetsi ehumbɔbɔr gyina adasefo beenu anaa baasa anomu asɛm do ku no a:"

column2: "akatua a ɔyɛ dzen bɛn na hom susu dɛ wobobu dɛ ɔsɛ nyia oetsiatsia Nyankopɔn Ba no do
column3: na oebu ahyɛmu bɔgyaa a wɔdze tseew no ho no ehuhudze
column4: na ɔabɔ adom Sunsum no adapaa?"

column2: "Na yenyim nyia ɔka dɛ
column3: Awerdzi yɛ medze
column4: na mubotua kaw; na bio so

column2: "Adze a ɔyɛ hu nye dɛ ebɔtɔ Nyankopɔn tseasefo no ne nsamu."
"Na hom nkaa nkan nda a hom nyaa kan ekyir no hom sɔɔw amandzehu ko kɛse no;"
"bi nye dɛ hom nam ahorbahyɛ nye ahohia do yɛɛ guasohwɛdze
column3: na bi so nye dɛ hom yɛɛ hɔn a wɔayɛ hɔn dɛm no hɔn anyɛnkofo."

column2: "Na hom nyaa ayamuhyehye wɔ ndaduafo no ho
column3: na hom dze enyigye peen hom ahodze no fom do
column4: osiandɛ hom nyim dɛ homankasa hom wɔ ahodze a oye kyɛn iyi

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mma hom nntow hom ndam a ɔwɔ akatua pii no nnkyen."
"Na ohia hom abotar
column3: na sɛ hom wie Nyankopɔn apɛdze yɛ a
column4: hom nsa aaka anohoba no."

column2: "Na aka kakraabi dɛm Na nyia ɔreba no aba
column3: na ɔrennkyɛr."

column2: "Na me tseneneenyi no nam gyedzi do benya nkwa
column3: Na sɛ ɔsan ekyir a
column4: me kra enyi ronnsɔ no."

column2: "Na hɛn dze
column3: yɛmmfora hɔn a wɔtwe hɔnho ekyir kɔ ɔsɛɛ mu no
column4: na mbom yɛfora hɔn a wɔgye dzi dze gye hɔn kra nkwa no mu."
